version_description:
Changes in 6.3:
- Minor bugfixes

Other recent new features
• Blocs Wave Export - Send your Blocs Wave creations directly to Launchpad
• Launchpad Soundpack Sharing - Open Launchpad soundpacks in Blocs Wave
• Project editing and Audio Import on iPhone
• New store on iPad helps you find soundpacks you might like

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like our app and have a minute to spare, please review the app in the app store.

Changes in 6.3.1:
- Huge improvements to battery life
- Various bug fixes

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like our app and have a minute to spare, please review the app in the app store.

Thanks for using Launchpad! This version introduces Tips on iPhone, and also includes a few important bug fixes.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like our app and have a minute to spare, please review the app in the app store.

Thanks for using Launchpad! We’ve added Tips on iPhone to help you understand the way Launchpad works. We’ve also included a few important bugfixes.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like Launchpad and have a minute to spare, please review it in the app store. You can also review the app on iPhone from within the in-app menu.

The original Launchpad — All-new design, available now. Free update.

We’re proud to announce a huge update to Launchpad. We’ve been working hard to redesign the app and make it even more beautiful, easy to use and powerful on new iPhones and iPads.

Highlight Features
• All-new design — Slick new interface. Crisp and responsive on all new iPhones and iPads.
• 3 new free soundpacks — Midnight House, Future Trap and Funk
• Go pro — All the pro features in the Pro Features Collection (iPad only)
• New iPhone layout — Swipe sound groups vertically, even while using FX
• Redesigned FX — All-new graphical design

Other Updates
• Pad groups — Easily see which pads are grouped on iPhone or iPad
• Track meters on iPhone — See which tracks are playing, even while using FX
• Various minor bugfixes and improvements

We appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like Launchpad and have a minute to spare, please review it in the app store.

This update fixes a crash when exporting projects from Blocs Wave to Launchpad. Big thanks to everyone who told us about this issue.
(If you reviewed the app to let us know about this bug, we'd be grateful if you could amend your review!)

***** ***** ***** *****

The original Launchpad — All-new design, available now. Free update.

We’re proud to announce a huge update to Launchpad. We’ve been working hard to redesign the app and make it even more beautiful, easy to use and powerful on new iPhones and iPads.

Highlight Features
• All-new design — Slick new interface. Crisp and responsive on all new iPhones and iPads.
• 3 new free soundpacks — Midnight House, Future Trap and Funk
• Go pro — All the pro features in the Pro Features Collection (iPad only)
• New iPhone layout — Swipe sound groups vertically, even while using FX
• Redesigned FX — All-new graphical design

Other Updates
• Pad groups — Easily see which pads are grouped on iPhone or iPad
• Track meters on iPhone — See which tracks are playing, even while using FX
• Various minor bugfixes and improvements

We appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like Launchpad and have a minute to spare, please review it in the app store.

Thanks for all your feedback about the new version of Launchpad!
This update fixes the disappearing text when using the filters, volumes or FX on iPad.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like Launchpad and have a minute to spare, please review it in the app store.

***** ***** ***** *****

The original Launchpad — All-new design, available now. Free update.

We’re proud to announce a huge update to Launchpad. We’ve been working hard to redesign the app and make it even more beautiful, easy to use and powerful on new iPhones and iPads.

Highlight Features
• All-new design — Slick new interface. Crisp and responsive on all new iPhones and iPads.
• 3 new free soundpacks — Midnight House, Future Trap and Funk
• Go pro — All the pro features in the Pro Features Collection (iPad only)
• New iPhone layout — Swipe sound groups vertically, even while using FX
• Redesigned FX — All-new graphical design

Other Updates
• Pad groups — Easily see which pads are grouped on iPhone or iPad
• Track meters on iPhone — See which tracks are playing, even while using FX

We’re still working hard to make the app even more beautiful, easy to use and powerful on new iPhones and iPads. This version fixes a crash when exporting a project from Blocs Wave to Launchpad, and also includes various graphical improvements throughout the app. Thanks as always for using Launchpad!

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like Launchpad and have a minute to spare, please review it in the app store.

All loops in the browser now display their musical key. You can also search by key to find loops that perfectly fit your project.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like Launchpad and have a minute to spare, please review it in the app store.

In this version we’ve modernised the FX edit panel on iPad to bring it up to date with the slick new design. The FX In-App Purchases allow you to customise the parameters and channels for each FX pad, leading to some exciting and creative combinations.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com or ampifymusic.com/survey. If you like Launchpad and have a minute to spare, please review it in the app store.

With the latest update you can now easily share your creation to Instagram via the new share feature. Using the #LaunchAmpify hashtag, you can comment, favourite and share each others creations on Instagram.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have comments, questions or feature requests, let us know at support@ampifymusic.com. If you like Launchpad and have a minute to spare, please review it in the app store.

Unlock your creativity by changing the key of your project. Combine sounds from different soundpacks to experiment with new genres and create diverse tracks. The browser now previews samples at the key and tempo of the project, which means they'll always sound great.

This version makes it easier to restore and remove your soundpacks. Open the Home page, tap the 'Library' tab, open the 'more' menu, then tap 'Manage Soundpacks'. In here you can restore purchased soundpacks, remove installed soundpacks, and create new projects from soundpack templates.
